data.author: Chris Lalancette
data.message:
Fixes pointed out by clang (#104)

* Fix a warning from clang about an unused assignment.

* Make another SubscriptionBase::subscribe method pure virtual.

As it stood, it was only ever calling itself, which
was pointed out by clang as an infinite recursion.
It only makes sense if a downstream class overrides this
method, so mark it as pure virtual here.

Signed-off-by: Chris Lalancette <clalancette@gmail.com>

data.author: Chris Lalancette
data.message:
Update the HasHeader check to be more specific. (#101)

That is, make sure that not only does the message have a
field called 'header', but that it also is of type
std_msgs/msg/Header.  Otherwise we won't be able to compile
the bits below.

Signed-off-by: Chris Lalancette <clalancette@gmail.com>

data.author: Russ
data.message: feat: add signal time functions to ExactTime policy (#94)

data.author: Chris Lalancette
data.message:
Update message_filters to C++17. (#88)

The main reason to do this is so that we can compile message filters
with the clang static analyzer.  As of clang++-14 (what is in
Ubuntu 22.04), the default still seems to be C++14, so we need
to specify C++17 so that new things in the rclcpp headers work
properly.

Further, due to reasons I don't fully understand, I needed to
set CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD_REQUIRED in order for clang to really use
that version.  So set this as well.

Signed-off-by: Chris Lalancette <clalancette@openrobotics.org>

Signed-off-by: Chris Lalancette <clalancette@openrobotics.org>

data.author: Steven! Ragnarök
data.message:
Depend directly on python_cmake_module.

Since we use it directly, I think it ought to be added to the manifest.
As to why it's not strictly needed to build, I believe it's bubbling up
from an exported dependency chain starting with a
buildtool_export_depend in rosidl_generator_py.

data.message:
[message_filters] Fast approximate time synchronization in message_filters (pure python) (#802)

* Fast approximate time synchronization in message_filters

* Don't break the api of message_filters Synchronizers

* Required changes to merge origin/kinetic-devel

data.author: Martin Pecka
data.message:
Allowed saving timestamp-less messages to Cache (using rospy.Time.now() as their timestamp).

Also added a convenience `getLast` method for retrieving the last message in the cache.

data.author: Kartik Mohta
data.message: Use boost::make_shared instead of new for constructing boost::shared_ptr (#740)

data.author: Kentaro Wada
data.message: Add __getattr__ to handle sub in message_filters as standard one

data.author: Dirk Thomas
data.message:
Merge pull request #599 from ros/cache-object

Message filters Cache object implementation for python (redux)

data.author: Martin Llofriu
data.message: Message filters Cache object implementation for python

data.author: Dirk Thomas
data.message: Merge branch 'indigo-devel' of github.com:ros/ros_comm into indigo-devel

data.author: Vincent Rabaud
data.message:
fixes #424
incorporates the approximate Python time synchronizer that used to be in camera_calibration

data.author: Nikolaus Demmel
data.message:
Fix segmentation fault on OS X 10.9 (clang / libc++)

Accessing front() of an empty std::deque is undefined behavior.
With gcc/libstdc++ it seems fine, on clang / libc++ it causes a segmentation fault.

data.author: Dirk Thomas
data.message: update code after refactoring into rosbag_storage and roscpp_core (#299)

data.author: Dirk Thomas
data.message: update message filters to use add_rostest_gtest (#258)

data.author: Markus Achtelik
data.message: keyword template is unnecessary for signal_.template addCallback() and Intel compiler failed compiling this

data.author: Daniel Stonier
data.message: add macro file for the message filters desclspecs.

data.author: Dirk Thomas
data.message: updated cmake min version to 2.8.3, use cmake_parse_arguments instead of custom macro

data.author: Dave Hershberger
data.message: rosmsg, rosnode, message_filters, and roswtf ported to latest catkin.  rosgraph/package.xml got a new test_depend on mock.

data.author: Dirk Thomas
data.message: use install destination variables, removed manual installation of manifests

data.author: dirk-thomas
data.message: removed obsolete catkin tag from manifest files

data.author: kwc
data.message: more workaround for message_filters tests as the test target conflicts.  move all tests into parent cmake

data.author: gerkey
data.message: rely on catkin having already found gtest

data.author: gerkey
data.message:
move add_rostest into rostest-extras.cmake, updated find_package() calls to
include rosunit and rostest where appropriate

data.author: gerkey
data.message: add more missing deps (should be removed once recursive find_package() is in place

data.author: gerkey
data.message:
Added <catkin/> and removed <depend/> from manifests.  Left in the <depend
package="roslang"/> in roscpp, rospy, and roslisp, because that's needed
for rosbuild to load their code generation logic.  Will consider
special-casing them in rosbuild and removing the tags.

data.author: ethanrublee
data.message:
Adding install targets.
Removing redundant catkin.cmake files.

data.author: ethanrublee
data.message: update to reflect refactor in catkin

data.author: mkjaergaard
data.message: Added catkin support to std_srvs and message_filterse

data.author: straszheim
data.message:
Remove ros::Message base class and ros/message.h header file

- finish traits implementation: add IsMessage<T>, move message headers
  map from Message base class to implemented class.

- tweaks to 
  * rosbag
  * topic_tools
  * message_filters

  mostly where these packages implement messages from scratch.

Closes #3758, but of course I haven't chased down all instances where
ros/message.h is included or there is an actual dependency on
ros::Message

data.author: straszheim
data.message: rosbuild2 stuff, the entertainment goes on and on

data.author: straszheim
data.message: Stop unused variable warnings, thanks vijay and stu.  q.v. #3300

data.author: straszheim
data.message:
patch for cross-compliation on arm:

  https://code.ros.org/trac/ros/ticket/2822

not identical to the submitted patch and may break regular *and*
cross-compile.  See also https://code.ros.org/trac/ros/ticket/3248.
Proper fix for this to come in rosbuild2.
